platformSettings.title: Platform Settings
platformSettings.description: Configure global settings and default behaviors for the ResumeMatch AI platform.

platformName.label: Platform Name
platformName.description: The public name of your platform.

maintenanceMode.label: Maintenance Mode
maintenanceMode.description: Temporarily disable access for users while performing updates.

defaultProfileVisibility.label: Default New User Profile Visibility
defaultProfileVisibility.description: Set the default visibility for new user profiles.

maxResumesPerUser.label: Max Resumes per User
maxResumesPerUser.description: Max number of resume profiles a user can create.

defaultTheme.label: Default Theme
defaultTheme.description: Set the default theme for new users.

enablePublicProfilePages.label: Enable Public Profile Pages
enablePublicProfilePages.description: Allow users to have publicly accessible profile URLs.

sessionTimeoutMinutes.label: Session Timeout (Minutes)
sessionTimeoutMinutes.description: Duration of inactivity before users are logged out.

globalAnnouncement.label: Global Announcement
globalAnnouncement.description: Display a banner or message across the platform.
globalAnnouncement.placeholder: Enter a brief announcement for all users

autoModeratePosts.label: Auto-Moderate New Posts (Mock)
autoModeratePosts.description: If enabled, new posts might be hidden pending review based on content filters.

maxJobPostingDays.label: Max Job Posting Duration (Days)
maxJobPostingDays.description: Default number of days a job posting stays active.

xpForNewPost.label: XP Awarded for New Community Post
xpForNewPost.description: Points for creating a new post in community feed.

pointsForAffiliateSignup.label: Points for Affiliate Signup
pointsForAffiliateSignup.description: XP or Coins awarded to referrer on successful signup.

defaultAppointmentCost.label: Default Appointment Cost (Coins)
defaultAppointmentCost.description: Default coin cost for booking an appointment with alumni.

maxEventRegistrationsPerUser.label: Max Event Registrations per User
maxEventRegistrationsPerUser.description: Limit how many events a user can register for (optional).

tenantCustomization.description: Control whether individual tenants can customize certain aspects.

allowTenantCustomBranding.label: Allow Tenant Custom Branding
allowTenantCustomBranding.description: Permit tenant admins to set custom logos and theme colors.

allowTenantEmailCustomization.label: Allow Tenant Email Customization (Mock)
allowTenantEmailCustomization.description: Permit tenant admins to customize automated email templates.

settingsSaved.title: Settings Saved
settingsSaved.description: Platform settings have been updated successfully.

validation.platformNameMin: Platform name must be at least 3 characters
validation.maxJobPostingDaysMin: Max job posting days must be at least 1
validation.maxJobPostingDaysMax: Max job posting days cannot exceed 365
validation.maxResumesMin: Max resumes must be at least 1
validation.sessionTimeoutMin: Session timeout must be at least 5 minutes
validation.sessionTimeoutMax: Session timeout cannot exceed 1440 minutes (24 hours)
validation.maxEventRegistrationsMin: Max event registrations must be at least 1
validation.pointsForAffiliateMin: Points for affiliate signup must be non-negative

tenantManagement.title: Tenant Management
tenantManagement.description: Oversee and manage all tenants within the platform.
tenantManagement.editActionMock: Editing tenant {tenantId}... (This would typically navigate to a detailed tenant settings page or a more complex edit dialog).

formLabels.allowPublicSignup: Allow Public Signup for this Tenant

validation.tenantNameMin: Tenant name must be at least 3 characters
validation.adminPasswordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters

announcementsAdmin.title: Announcement Management
announcementsAdmin.manageTenant: Manage platform-wide or targeted announcements for {tenantId}.
announcementsAdmin.noAnnouncementsTenant: No announcements found for your tenant or globally.

permissionDeniedEdit.title: Permission Denied
permissionDeniedEdit.description: You can only edit announcements you created for your tenant, or platform-wide announcements if applicable.

permissionDeniedDelete.title: Permission Denied
permissionDeniedDelete.description: You can only delete announcements you created for your tenant.

validation.titleMin: Title must be at least 5 characters
validation.contentMin: Content must be at least 10 characters

contentModeration.title: Content Moderation
contentModeration.descriptionTenant: Review and manage posts flagged by users or AI within your tenant: {tenantId}.
contentModeration.descriptionPlatform: Review and manage posts flagged by users or AI.
contentModeration.noFlaggedPostsTenant: No posts are currently flagged for review in your tenant.
contentModeration.noFlaggedPostsPlatform: No posts are currently flagged for review.

postApproved.title: Post Approved
postApproved.description: Post marked as visible. Refresh Community Feed to see changes.

postRemoved.title: Post Removed
postRemoved.description: Post marked as removed. Refresh Community Feed to see changes.

blogSettingsAdmin.title: AI Blog Generation Settings
blogSettingsAdmin.description: Configure automated blog post generation and manually trigger posts.
blogSettingsAdmin.generationIntervalHelp: How often should a new blog post be generated? (e.g., 24 for daily)
blogSettingsAdmin.topicsPlaceholder: e.g., Resume Tips, Interview Skills, Career Growth
blogSettingsAdmin.topicsHelp: AI will pick from these topics for scheduled posts.
blogSettingsAdmin.selectTopicManualPlaceholder: Select a topic or enter custom
blogSettingsAdmin.customTopicPlaceholder: Or type a custom topic here
blogSettingsAdmin.importantNoteContent: Actual automated scheduling of blog posts (e.g., every X hours) requires a background task runner or cron job on a server. This UI configures the parameters for such a system. The "Generate Now" button allows manual triggering for testing and content creation.

settingsSaved.title: Settings Saved
settingsSaved.description: AI blog generation settings have been updated.

noTopicSelected.title: No Topic Selected
noTopicSelected.description: Please select or enter a topic to generate a blog post.

postGenerated.title: AI Blog Post Generated!
postGenerated.description: Post titled "{title}" has been created. You can view it on the blog page.

generationFailed.title: Generation Failed
generationFailed.description: An error occurred while generating the blog post.

validation.intervalMin: Interval must be at least 1 hour
validation.topicsRequired: At least one topic is required

featureRequests.pageDescription: Share your ideas for improving ResumeMatch AI or vote on existing suggestions.
featureRequests.dialogDescriptionCreate: We value your input! Let us know what you'd like to see.
featureRequests.formDescriptionPlaceholder: Explain your feature idea, its benefits, and how it might work.
featureRequests.noRequestsDescription: Have an idea to improve ResumeMatch AI? Be the first to suggest it!

toastSuggestionUpdated.title: Suggestion Updated
toastSuggestionUpdated.description: Your feature request has been updated.

toastCannotEdit.title: Cannot Edit
toastCannotEdit.description: You can only edit your own pending requests, or admins can edit any.

validation.titleMin: Title must be at least 5 characters
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters

referrals.pageDescription: Share ResumeMatch AI with your network and earn rewards!
referrals.yourReferralCardDescription: Share this code or link with friends and colleagues.
referrals.statsCardDescription: Track the success of your referrals.
referrals.rewardsInfo: Rewards are typically credited once a referred user completes their profile setup.
referrals.historyCardDescription: Details of users you have referred.
referrals.howItWorksStep1: 1. Share your unique referral code or link.
referrals.howItWorksStep2: 2. Your friend signs up using your code/link.
referrals.howItWorksStep3: 3. Once they complete key actions (like profile setup or first analysis), you both might receive rewards (e.g., bonus XP or coins)!

toastShareAPINotSupported.title: Link Copied
toastShareAPINotSupported.description: Share API not supported. Referral link copied to clipboard instead.

userSettings.appearanceCardDescription: Customize the look and feel of the application.

userSettings.logoUploadHelpText: Replace the logo URL above with an uploaded image (mocked upload).
userSettings.platformFeaturesAdminCardDescription: Enable or disable specific application features globally.
userSettings.changePasswordDialogDescription: Enter your current password and a new password.
userSettings.confirmDataDeletionDialogDescription: To confirm, please type "{phrase}" in the box below. This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. We will process your request in accordance with our privacy policy.

toastPasswordMismatch.description: New password and confirm password do not match.
